# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which holds immense value for me due to its unique features and benefits. Considering its quality and the effort put into creating it, I believe it's worth more than its face value. For you, it could potentially be an exceptional investment or solution to your needs. I am offering this product to you for $150, which includes not only its intrinsic value but also a special discount for being one of our early adopters. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
